titleStmt.title: Tyrannicall-government anatomized, or, A discovrse concerning evil-councellors being the life and death of John the Baptist : and presented to the Kings most excellent Majesty by the Author.
Baptistes. English
titleStmt.author: Buchanan, George, 1506-1582.
Milton, John, 1608-1674.

notesStmt.note: An anonymous translation of Buchanan's Baptistes; originally printed as prose in: George Buchanan, Glasgow quartercentnary studies, 1906. p. [61]-90.
J.T.T. Brown attributes the translation to Milton.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
